Comments_List: The Sanskrit class has made me become more attentive to the linguistic tenets involved in language. The class has also improved my writing skills in the Devanagari script
The course has been indeed an engaging one where we are constantly made to deal with grammatical analyses through regular homework and practices.

For someone with a classical language background, learning Sanskrit essentially ties together everything you've ever learned about grammar and conjugations and declensions. It's also a lot easier if you come in with come knowledge of an inflected language.
I would definitely recommend this course as it ensures that one remains consistently in practising the language and internalising its grammatical tenets.
